messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3513
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/17/2003 9:25:49 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Here s one!  We left school because home was just a nicer, more interesting
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/17/2003 9:25:49 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> With over 1000 members on this list is there no one????? who has taken
> >their young kids out of public school when there was no real issues-(ie,
> >bad schools-learning difficulties-reluctance to go-bullying) other than
> the
> >conviction that realxed home schooling ar unschooling was a very positive
> >thing?
>

Here's one! <raising hand> We left school because home was just a nicer, more
interesting place to be....

If this is an old, old thread, forgive me. I get digests and often can't find
the time to read them. The fact that five in a row suddenly landed in my box
caught my eye. ;-)

~~~ Becky~~~

"To announce that there must be no criticism of the president,
or that we are to stand by the president right or wrong, is not only
unpatriotic and servile,
but is morally treasonable to the American public."
---Theodore Roosevelt






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
